Package Controller

Class MainFrameController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller<MainFrame>
Controller.MainFrameController
public class MainFrameController extends Controller<MainFrame>
Specialize Controller on MainFrame. Class used to manage the communication between all the controllers. It starts the actual game and sets the current visible panel.
This class uses the Singleton Pattern because this class is used in every Controller
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
